t: Twitch to Acquire Curse Gaming Media and Community Company
s: August 16, 2016 - Twitch, the Amazon-owned live game-broadcasting service, announced a deal to acquire privately held Curse, a company that provides news, information, guides, in-game chat and voice products, video and databases for some 30 million video-game fans each month. Terms of the deal weren’t disclosed.
